notes.text:
This update for runc fixes the following issues:

runc was updated to v1.0.0~rc10

- CVE-2019-19921: Fixed a mount race condition with shared mounts (bsc#1160452).
- Fixed an issue where podman run hangs when spawned by salt-minion process (bsc#1149954).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: runc through 1.0.0-rc9 has Incorrect Access Control leading to Escalation of Privileges, related to libcontainer/rootfs_linux.go. To exploit this, an attacker must be able to spawn two containers with custom volume-mount configurations, and be able to run custom images. (This vulnerability does not affect Docker due to an implementation detail that happens to block the attack.)
notes.title: CVE description
